CustomField.description: This field indicates how records are filtered through each rule when Rule Priority is assigned to the rules. In case of Pass Failed Records To Lower Priority Rules, failed records from high priority rule are passed to lower priority rule for evaluation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field indicates how records are filtered through each rule when Rule Priority is assigned to the rules. In case of Pass Failed Records To Lower Priority Rules, failed records from high priority rule are passed to lower priority rule for evaluation.
CustomField.label: Mode of Rule Execution On Priority

value.fullName: Run All Records For Each Rule
value.label: Run All Records For Each Rule

value.fullName: Pass Failed Records To Lower Priority Rules
value.label: Pass Failed Records To Lower Priority Rules

value.fullName: Pass Success Records To Lower Priority Rules
value.label: Pass Success Records To Lower Priority Rules
